org.microbean.weld.environments.common

Class DefaultDiscoveryStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.microbean.weld.environments.common.DelegatingDiscoveryStrategy
      • org.microbean.weld.environments.common.DefaultDiscoveryStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.jboss.weld.environment.deployment.discovery.DiscoveryStrategy
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NonScanningDiscoveryStrategy

    public class DefaultDiscoveryStrategy
extends DelegatingDiscoveryStrategy
    A DelegatingDiscoveryStrategy that delegates to a DiscoveryStrategy that is virtually 100% compatible with the default Weld behavior.

    This class exists primarily for those cases where end users wish to provide their own DiscoveryStrategy via the Java SPI mechanism, but need to fall back to default behavior, whatever that may be, if something is not right.

    This class has been designed like other DiscoveryStrategy implementations to be instantiated by the DiscoveryStrategyFactory class. Normally that means its instances are found in a Java SPI META-INF/services service provider file. Normally a DiscoveryStrategy implementation is instantiated, and then its setResourceLoader(ResourceLoader), setBootstrap(Bootstrap), setInitialBeanDefiningAnnotations(Set) and setScanner(BeanArchiveScanner) methods are called. Subclasses or callers should be prepared for any fields that might be set by these calls to be null at performDiscovery() time.

    Thread Safety

    Instances of this class are not safe for concurrent use by multiple threads.

    Author:
    Laird Nelson
    See Also:
    DelegatingDiscoveryStrategy, DiscoveryStrategyFactory
